p: The total flavonoids content (TFC) was measured according to a standard procedure [ 38]. A quantity of 4 mL of distilled water, and 300 μL of NaNO 2 (5%), were added to 1 mL of water extracts of fir needles, and the samples were allowed to stand for 5 min. Subsequently, 300 μL of AlCl 3 (10%) were added, and samples were left to stand for 6 min. Then, 2 mL of NaOH 1 M were added to stop the reaction, and samples were brought to a final volume of 10 mL with distilled water. Samples were read after 15 min.
